trends: There has been one other sighting in Jonesville
There were no other sightings in Jonesville on or around September 3rd 2013
Summary: My nephew saw it first, I observed it heading South, no sound, disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsMy nephew called to me from outside my Mother in Law's home in Thompson Settlement, a small community SW of Jonesville, Va. I went outside to see what he had observed. A shiny domed craft was observed in 100 percent visibility skies flying South at an undetermined altitude. No sound, no vapor trail. The craft proceeded in a South Direction, then disappeared completely and instantly. There was no where for it to go, and there were no other craft visible in the sky at that time. The sky was blue with no clouds visible. At first I thought it might be an aircraft that had already gone by, but there was no vapor trail and no noise, there also were no wings visible. Speed was undetermined, but not real fast.
